option.name: L1 - F010 - Making the infrastructure available

L2 - F010.060 - Managing pneumatic energy
L2 - F010.070 - Managing data
L2 - F010.080 - Managing lubricants

option.description: All functions before moving and working with the machine, typically once before starting work
option.name: L1 - F020 - Preparing the machine
L2 - F020.010 - Loading / shipping the machine
L2 - F020.020 - Putting the machine into operation for the first time
L2 - F020.030 - Accessing the machine
L2 - F020.040 - Setting up the driver's workplace
L2 - F020.050 - Moving the cab
L2 - F020.060 - Connecting / disconnecting front attachments / implements / vehicle-mounted implements / ancillary equipment / trailer
L2 - F020.070 - Preparing the machine for road travel / fieldwork
L1 - F030 - Moving the machine

option.description: Strategy in which the travel speed, the engine output or the throughput can be adapted while driving, as a function of the conditions of use
option.name: L2 - F030.010 - Selecting the driving strategy

option.description: Selecting the forward gear / reverse gear
option.name: L2 - F030.020 - Selecting the direction of travel
L2 - F030.030 - Shifting the transmission

option.description: This function also implements constant driving
option.name: L2 - F030.040 - Driving off / accelerating / driving the machine
L2 - F030.045 - Decelerating / braking the machine
L2 - F030.050 - Steering the machine
L2 - F030.060 - Adapting the machine to the terrain
L2 - F030.070 - Ensuring machine traction
L2 - F030.080 - Towing the machine
L1 - F040 - Working with the machine
L2 - F040.010 - Crop pick-up

option.description: - Controlling the belt speed - Adjusting / measuring / controlling / displaying the crop conveying process - Monitoring the packer, measuring the packer load, adapting crop conveying to the lateral slope (e.g. slope controller for DISCO) - Measuring the layer thickness - Lifting / lowering the conveyor auger - Adjusting the intake auger - Adjusting the intake auger height - Adjusting the intake auger speed - Adjusting the intake auger scraper profiles
option.name: L2 - F040.020 - Conveying / transporting crop
L2 - F040.030 - Crop processing
L2 - F040.040 - Collecting crop
L2 - F040.050 - Discharging the crop

option.description: - Adjusting the spreading width of the chaff / plant residues (e.g., adjusting the spreader plate) - Adjusting the spreading direction of the crop / chaff / plant residues (also adapting chopping and spreading to the lateral slope)
option.name: L2 - F040.055 - Depositing the plant residues
L2 - F040.060 - Assessing the quality of work
L2 - F040.070 - Using the implement / front loader / lift arms / telescopic arm
L2 - F040.080 - Detecting / removing clogging / overload
L1 - F050 - Making comfort and protective functions available
L2 - F050.010 - Air conditioning

option.description: - Making broadcast radio available - Receiving a radio station - Connecting / setting up a smartphone - Making a handsfree car kit available
option.name: L2 - F050.020 - Making multimedia available

option.description: - Filling / securing the storage space - Making storage space for operating resources (e.g. baler twine) available - Collecting waste (incl. ashtray) - Making a tool box available
option.name: L2 - F050.030 - Making storage space available
L2 - F050.040 - Ensuring perceptibility and visibility
L2 - F050.050 - Making protective functions available
L2 - F050.060 - Ensuring user ergonomics
L2 - F050.070 - Automating / optimising machine operation

option.description: Help, operator's manual, also wizard for support when making settings
option.name: L2 - F050.080 - Documenting machine operation

option.description: Here only temporary connections are described.
option.name: L1 - F060 - Making connectivity available
L2 - F060.020 - Updating the software

option.description: incl. calibration, parametrisation, configuration, writing data, writing / reading / comparing data, triggering routines, also developer's access to the machine
option.name: L2 - F060.040 - Communicating with the diagnostics system (send / receive)

option.description: - Managing field operating data - Using task management (planning / setting the machine / field / use data) - Remote monitoring of machine (telemetry, position display) - Making the infrastructure of interfaces available for exchange (non-permanent) - Examples of operating data: machine condition, counter - Examples of process data: CEMOS, sieve capacity utilisation, speed, unit settings, TELEMATICS
option.name: L2 - F060.060 - Exchanging operating data / process data

option.description: M2X (Machine2X), fleets, using parallel tracking / driving, also communication of autonomous machines
option.name: L2 - F060.080 - Communicating with other machines
